H0.text: In the Bible, who was put to death, because King Ahab coveted his vineyard. Uriah

H1.text: In the Bible, who was put to death, because King Ahab coveted his vineyard. Ananias

H2.text: In the Bible, who was put to death, because King Ahab coveted his vineyard. Achan

H3.text: In the Bible, who was put to death, because King Ahab coveted his vineyard. Naboth

A4.text: Elijah criticized Ahab for his role in Naboth's unjust execution.
